message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, let's try for more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're still not giving me enough, I want more!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm not giving up yet! Let's try to find a middle ground.
You're getting desperate, but I'm still not satisfied!
I'm running out of options, but I'm still trying to get a fair deal. This is my last offer, Bob!
You're running out of time, and so am I. This is my last chance to get a good deal!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down now. Take what's left, or we both get nothing!
I'm not going to accept this unfair offer. I'd rather we both get nothing than take this one-sided deal.
Fine, have it your way. I'll take almost all the money, and you can have a dollar. It's better than nothing!
